meanings.definition: Arars: a type of tree or shrub
meanings.sent1: The arars in the park provide shade for picnics.
meanings.sent2: I planted some arars in my garden to attract birds.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the arars as a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The arars stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the arars danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Arars: the plural form of arar
meanings.sent1: I saw a group of arars flying in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The arars chirped melodiously at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The arars gathered on the telephone wire, gossiping.
meanings.sent4: The arars painted the sky with their colorful feathers.
meanings.sent5: The flock of arars created a beautiful pattern in the sky.

meanings.definition: Arars: belonging to or relating to arars
meanings.sent1: The arars habitat is carefully protected by conservationists.
meanings.sent2: She studied the arars behavior for her research project.
meanings.sent3: The arars festival celebrated the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent4: His arars-inspired artwork captured the essence of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The arars conservation efforts helped preserve the ecosystem.
